content: Since @Grahame Grieve posted this interesting piece http://www.healthintersections.com.au/?p=2835 two weeks ago I've been looking around to see whether anyone has been trying to transform the approach from science fiction to reality !?

see https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/102-questionnaire but the answer is, no, we're all heads down getting the ballot ready, then there'll be a rush of action in the lead in to the baltimore meeting
Thanks.! I'm still 'filling in' and have to process before asking further questions. This is going to be a big deal. Thumbs up!
@Ewout Kramer, @Christiaan Knaap Vonk supports FHIRPath. Could we prototype Active Questionnaires interpretation with Vonk FHIR Components?
